name: The Backrooms: Escape
description:
You - find recordings on which a person unknown to you is in a [CLASSIFIED], mysterious place. Who knows what these old tapes are hiding.

The recording takes place in [CLASSIFIED], when Sonax employees hire guinea pigs to conduct so-called tests on the territory of [CLASSIFIED]. All this in the name of progress and science. After a few studies in [CLASSIFIED], the company lost a lot of employees - scientists. The research was stopped, and the project was classified...

Embark on the mysterious world of the Backroom. Explore different locations (Liminal Spaces, Backrooms Levels).



In the game you will get into the most popular Backrooms levels and will be able to explore them. At each level, you will find different ways to escape and dangers on the way. Find a way to leave this place.

Beautiful graphics, minimal user interface and gloomy atmosphere will ensure immersion in the game.
Be careful, falling out of reality is the most common way to get into Backrooms.
